evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] well , this one sprung a dead woman ... vanessa keaton
[[Nick]] killer strolls in next thing you know , landlord 's deli meat
[[Grissom]] hodges matched the water in vanessa keaton 's lungs
[[Robbins]] blunt-force trauma to the occipital region
[[Warrick]] charlie confessed to killing the landlord
[[Warrick]] luckily , she left her prints behind
[[Sara]] the woman in the photo is not vanessa
[[Grissom]] your stepmother 's blood is on the tines , and your fingerprints are on the handle
